duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate and manage invention disclosures, develop innovation and licensing strategies, and conduct outreach to successfully commercialize University-owned intellectual property.
Maintain a close working relationship with other OTM and campus staff to fulfill the obligations of federal compliance, IP protection, and related needs.
Develop and manage strong relationships with faculty inventors and prospective inventors, providing specialized advice and counsel on technology commercialization.

Perform licensing and marketing responsibilities, including evaluating and screening disclosures, identifying and qualifying licensees, drafting business terms for license agreements, and independent development of marketing strategies.
Train, supervise, and mentor colleague and support staff as needed, and oversee programs to further advance and promote innovation at UIC.
Provide assistance to the Director, OTM, on matters as needed, and lead or work with OTM staff to improve and maintain procedures for administrative efficiency.

Strengthen relationships within the innovation ecosystem, interface with senior executives and decision-makers in various industries, and provide strategic vision, planning, and execution of university-wide programs to expedite innovation and catalyze commercialization.
Work as an integral part of a team contributing to the on-going evolution of UIC OTM in its mission of commercializing University intellectual property and enhancing economic development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in related field (Master's preferred) with technical background in a research area aligned with the technology portfolio.
